channel.title: Haveing items spawn on ground?
channel.description: How do i have phats spawn on the ground in varrock center?

item.title: Haveing items spawn on ground?
item.dc:creator: @Leecher_Ian Leecher Ian
item.description:
@Leecher_Ian wrote:

in itemspawnpoint ull s4ee this voidâ€¦

public void LoadItems() {
    for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++) {
        if (spawntimer <= 1) {
            ItemHandler.addItem(2414, 3118, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Zammy Cape
            ItemHandler.addItem(2412, 3119, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Sara Cape
            ItemHandler.addItem(2413, 3120, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Guthix Cape
            spawntimer = 100;
        }
    }
}

Just do sumthing like

public void LoadItems() {
    for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++) {
        if (spawntimer <= 1) {
            ItemHandler.addItem(2414, 3118, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Zammy Cape
            ItemHandler.addItem(2412, 3119, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Sara Cape
            ItemHandler.addItem(2413, 3120, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Guthix Cape
            ItemHandler.addItem(Itemid, x, y, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // red phat
            spawntimer = 100;
        }
    }

(add ItemHandler.addItem(Itemid, x, y, 1,
ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // red phat

edit (Itemid, x, y, 1,
}
